dashboard.description: Monitor Linux host (VM, Server, OS), your personal machines with preconfigured beautiful dashboard.

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together
panels.title: CPU Busy

targets.expr:
sum( smartmon_reallocate_nand_blk_cnt_raw_value ) +
sum( smartmon_reallocated_sector_ct_raw_value ) +
sum( smartmon_reallocated_event_count_raw_value ) +
sum( smartmon_raw_read_error_rate_raw_value ) +
sum( smartmon_current_pending_sector_raw_value ) +
sum( smartmon_offline_uncorrectable_raw_value ) +
sum( smartmon_udma_crc_error_count_raw_value ) +
sum( smartmon_seek_error_rate_raw_value ) +
sum( smartmon_spin_retry_count_raw_value ) +
sum( smartmon_multi_zone_error_rate_raw_value )

dashboard.title: testounet
